BML: json (create object).description: Create a JSON object from a JSON formatted string (or empty if omitted).

body: // Check if a JSON key is null
// Check if an array index is null
BML: isjsonnull.description: Checks for null values in a JSON object or JSON array. Returns boolean.
BML: isjsonnull.signature: Boolean isjsonnull(Json jsonIdentifier, String key (or JsonArray jsonArrayIdentifier, Integer index))

BML: jsonget.description: Retrieve a value from a JSON object for the given key. Optional valueType and defaultValue.
BML: jsonget.signature: <ValueType> jsonget(Json jsonIdentifier, String key [, String valueType [, <ValueType> defaultValue]])

body: // Put or update a key in a JSON object
BML: jsonput.description: Adds or updates a key-value entry in a JSON object. Returns the inserted/updated value.

body: // Remove first-level key from JSON object
BML: jsonremove.description: Removes a first-level key-value entry from a JSON object. Returns boolean.

BML: jsoncopy.description: Creates a copy of a JSON object. Changes to the original will not affect the copy.

body: // Convert JSON object to JSON-formatted string
BML: jsontostr.description: Converts a JSON object into a JSON formatted string.

BML: jsonkeys.description: Retrieves all first-level keys from a JSON object and returns an array of strings. If the optional parameter (ignoreNullValues) is set to true, null value keys are ignored.

BML: jsonnull.description: Creates an instance of a JSON null object.

BML: jsonarray (create array).description: Create a JSON array from a JSON-formatted array string, or an empty array if omitted.

body: // Append a value to end of JSON array
BML: jsonarrayappend.description: Appends a value to the end of a JSON array and returns the appended value.

body: // Get an element from a JSON array
BML: jsonarrayget.description: Returns the value from a JSON array at a given index. Optional valueType.
BML: jsonarrayget.signature: <ValueType> jsonarrayget(JsonArray jsonArrayIdentifier, Integer index [, String valueType])

BML: jsonarraysize.description: Returns the size (number of elements) of a JSON array.

body: // Remove an element from array by index
BML: jsonarrayremove.description: Removes an element from a JSON array. The size of the array object after the object is removed is returned. An error is thrown if the given index is not available.

body: // Make a copy of a JSON array
BML: jsonarraycopy.description: Creates a copy of a JSON array.

BML: jsonarraytostr.description: Converts a JSON array into a JSON formatted string.

body: // Get a unique reference id for JSON array
BML: jsonarrayrefid.description: Returns a unique reference ID that represents the input JSON array. Can only be invoked by Commerce advanced modify, auto update or advanced default functions. This function provides a more efficient method to pass a JSON array to the BML output to update an array set.

BML: jsonpathgetmultiple.description: Retrieve multiple values or nodes for a JSONPath expression. asPath=false returns values, true returns nodes.
BML: jsonpathgetmultiple.signature: JsonArray jsonpathgetmultiple(Json jsonIdentifier, String jsonPath [, Boolean asPath])

BML: jsonpathgetsingle.description: Retrieves the first node or value corresponding to a JSONPath expression. The valueType and defaultValue parameters are optional.
BML: jsonpathgetsingle.signature: <ValueType> jsonpathgetsingle(Json jsonIdentifier, String jsonPath [, String valueType [, <ValueType> defaultValue]])

body: // Set/update all nodes matching jsonPath to a new value
BML: jsonpathset.description: Updates all nodes matched by a JSONPath expression and returns the nodes updated.
BML: jsonpathset.signature: String[] jsonpathset(Json jsonIdentifier, String jsonPath, <ValueType> value)

body: // Check whether a JSONPath exists in the JSON object
BML: jsonpathcheck.description: Checks if a JSONPath exists in a JSON object; returns boolean.

BML: jsonpathremove.description: Removes nodes matching a JSONPath expression from the JSON object; returns boolean.

BML: len.description: Returns the number of characters in the string.

BML: string.description: Converts a float, integer or boolean value into text.

BML: substring.description: Extracts a substring from the given string.

BML: startswith.description: Checks whether a string starts with a particular substring.

BML: endswith.description: Checks whether a string ends with a particular substring.

BML: lower.description: converts all characters in the text into all lowercase letters.

BML: upper.description: converts all characters in the text into all uppercase letters.

BML: split.description: Split a string into an array by delimiter.

BML: join.description: Join an array of strings into a single string.

BML: formatascurrency.description: Takes a number and returns it as a formatted currency string.

BML: atoi.description: Converts text that represents a number into an integer value.

BML: atof.description: Converts text that represents a number into a float value.

BML: isnumber.description: Returns true when the string is a number and false if it contains other characters.

BML: find.description: Returns the position of a substring within a string.

BML: decodebase64.description: Takes an encoded Base64 string and returns it as a plain text string.

BML: encodebase64.description: Parses the string parameter and converts it into its Base64 equivalent, as an encoded string.

BML: getcurrencyvalue.description: Takes a formatted currency string and returns the string's numeric value.

BML: html.description: A method for HTML escaping (output encoding) of a string as safe plain text.

BML: containskey (dictionary).description: Returns true if the specified key exists in the dictionary.

BML: dict (create dictionary).description: Create a dictionary for the specified data type.

BML: get (dictionary).description: Get the value stored in the dictionary for the given key.

BML: keys (dictionary).description: Retrieve an unordered string array of all keys in a dictionary.

BML: put (dictionary).description: Insert or update a value in the dictionary under the given key.

BML: values (dictionary).description: Get an array of all values stored in the dictionary.

BML: comparedates.description: Compare two dates based on date and time.

BML: datetostr.description: Converts a date to a string.

BML: getcurrenttimeinmillis.description: Returns the current time in milliseconds.

BML: getdiffindays.description: Calculates the number of days between two different dates.

BML: getstrdate.description: Returns the string representation of current date.

BML: isleap.description: Returns true if the year provided is a leap year.

BML: isweekend.description: Returns true if the date provided is a Saturday or Sunday.

BML: strtojavadate.description: Converts a string to a date.

BML makeurlparam.description: Converts a series of name-value pairs into a query string, which can be appended to a URL.

BML urldata (GET).signature: urldata(String url, String httpMethod, [Dictionary headers], [String body], [Integer timeout]);

BML urldata (POST).signature: urldata(String url, String httpMethod, [Dictionary headers], [String body], [Integer timeout])

BML urldatabypost.signature: String urldatabypost(String url, String parameters, String defaultValue, [Integer timeout]]])

BML urldatabyget.signature: String urldatabyget(String url, String parameters, String defaultValue,[Integer timeout])

BML urldatabypostasync.description: Retrieves data asynchronously using POST method
BML urldatabypostasync.signature: String urldatabypostasync(String url, String parameters, String defaultValue, String callbackActionVarName, [Dictionary headers, [Boolean returnErrorResponse,[Integer timeout]]])

BML applytemplate.description: This function applies a set of token key-value pairs to the template file.
BML applytemplate.signature: String applytemplate(String templateFileLocation [, Dictionary payload [, String defaultErrorMessage [, Json jsonIdentifier]]])

BML readxmlmultiple.description: This function reads a set of multiple XML node contents based on a set of XPath expressions.
BML readxmlmultiple.signature: readxmlmultiple(String xmlPayload, String[] xpaths [, String defaultErrorMessage])

BML readxmlsingle.description: This function reads a set of single XML node content based on a set of XPath expressions.
BML readxmlsingle.signature: readxmlsingle(String xmlPayload, String[] xpaths [, String defaultErrorMessage])

BML transformxml.description: This function transforms an XML string with an XSLT file stored in the File Manager.
BML transformxml.signature: transformxml(String xml, String xslFileLocation [, String defaultErrorMessage])

BML append.description: This function will attach a new element to the end of an array.

BML boolean[n].description: Declare a 1-D boolean array with the specified size.

BML boolean[n][n].description: Declare a 2-D boolean array with the specified size.

BML bytearray.description: This function stores a collection of binary data such as the contents of a file.

BML date[n].description: Declare a 1-D date array with the specified size.

BML date[n][n].description: Declare a 2-D date array with the specified size.

BML findinarray.description: Find index of a value in an array

BML float[n].description: Declare a 1-D float array with the specified size.

BML float[n][n].description: Declare a 2-D float array with the specified size.

BML integer[n].description: Declare a 1-D integer array with the specified size.

BML integer[n][n].description: Declare a 2-D integer array with the specified size.

BML isempty.description: Check whether an array is empty

BML range.description: Declares an integer array with a specified size and initializes it to its index value.

BML remove.description: Remove element from array by index

BML sizeofarray.description: Return number of elements in array

BML sort.description: This function sorts array elements based on defined sort method. You can sort in ascending or descending order.

BML string[n][n].description: Declare a 2-D string array with the specified size.

BML acos.description: This function returns the arc cosine of the number or angle in the range of 0 through Ï€.

BML asin.description: This function returns the arcsine of a number or angle.

BML atan.description: This function returns the arctangent of the number or angle.

BML ceil.description: This function converts a float into the next highest whole number.

BML cos.description: This function returns the cosine of the number/angle.

BML cosh.description: This function returns the hyperbolic cosine of a number or angle.

BML exp.description: This function returns Euler's number e raised to the power of the number passed through the function, also known as the exponential function.

BML fabs.description: This function returns the absolute value of a number.

BML fmod.description: This function returns the remainder of the division operation x, y.

BML hypot.description: This function returns the sqrt(x2 + y2) without intermediaries.

BML integer.description: This function returns the integer portion of a float number.

BML ln.description: This function returns the natural logarithm (base e) of the number.

BML log.description: This function returns the base-10 logarithm of the number.

BML pow.description: This function returns the value of the first argument raised to the power of the second argument.

BML round.description: This function returns the rounded value of a number up to a certain decimal point.

BML sin.description: This function returns the trigonometric sine of the number/angle.

BML sinh.description: This function returns the hyperbolic sine of a number or angle.

BML sqrt.description: This function returns the positive square root of a number.

BML tan.description: This function returns the tangent of the number/angle.

BML tanh.description: This function returns the hyperbolic tangent of a number or angle.

BML globaldictset.description: This function adds or updates the key-value pair in the global dictionary.
BML globaldictset.signature: String globaldictset(String key, String value [, Integer minTimeToLive])

BML globaldictget.description: This function returns a value stored in the global dictionary corresponding to the given key. If the key is not found in the global dictionary, null is returned.

BML globaldictremove.description: The function returns true if the key-value pair is successfully removed, and returns false if the key does not exist in the global dictionary.

BML getsystemdata.description: Returns a JSON object containing the entire representation of the System Configuration Data.

BML getsystemattrvalues.description: This function returns a string containing a single attribute's values from a System Configuration.

BML getsystemmultipleattrvalues.description: This function returns dictionary key and value string arrays containing attribute values from a System Configuration.

BML usersessionset.description: This function sets a key-value pair to the user session cache. The values are available as long as the user session is active. Values stored in the session cache are removed automatically when the user logs out, the session expires, or the server is restarted.

BML usersessionget.description: This function retrieves a value for a given key from a user session. If the key is not found, null is returned.

BML usersessionremove.description: The function returns true if the key-value pair is successfully removed, and returns false if the key does not exist in the user session.

body: * Sample Test Data: refer to the test script
BML: header template.description: Standard header template for BML scripts.
